MENU.NAME: B.L.T.
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Simply delicious!  This classic on a Tomato Basil wrap, is filled with a double portion of our crispy bacon and finished off with lettuce, juicy tomatoes, and mayo.

MENU.NAME: Buffalo Chicken Signature Wrap
MENU.DESCRIPTION: A wrap that’s not afraid to be bold. We start with a double portion of seasoned & marinated chicken strips tossed in Buffalo sauce. Then we cut the heat with crisp lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers and red onion, and wrap it all up in a tomato basil wrap.

MENU.NAME: Cold Cut Combo
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Can’t decide what kind of meat you want? Get three at once on a delicious tomato basil wrap. Stacked with a double portion of turkey-based meats including ham, salami, and bologna. Enjoy it with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, and red onions.

MENU.NAME: Italian B.M.T. ®
MENU.DESCRIPTION: The Italian B.M.T. ® Signature Wrap tastes great on a tomato basil wrap. It's filled with a double portion of Genoa salami, spicy pepperoni, and Black Forest ham topped with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, and red onions. So tasty.

MENU.NAME: Meatball Marinara
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Our Meatball Marinara Signature Wrap is a double portion of Italian-style meatballs in irresistible marinara sauce, with Parmesan cheese, in a tomato basil wrap. Get yourself one.

MENU.NAME: Oven Roasted Chicken
MENU.DESCRIPTION: The Oven Roasted Chicken Signature Wrap is a fan favorite featuring a double portion of the oven roasted chicken you love, on a delicious spinach wrap. Top it with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, spinach, crisp green peppers, and red onions.

MENU.NAME: Spicy Italian
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Feeling spicy? Grab a Spicy Italian Signature Wrap. It's a double portion of spicy pepperoni and Genoa salami on a tomato basil wrap. Topped with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers and red onions…it's a pretty delicious meal.

MENU.NAME: Steak & Cheese

MENU.NAME: Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki
MENU.DESCRIPTION: The Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki Signature Wrap is a double portion of tender teriyaki-glazed, all-white meat chicken strips, raised without antibiotics, with seasoning and marinade topped with our fat-free sweet onion sauce. Wrap it up in a tomato basil wrap with lettuce, spinach, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, and red onions. Get ready for a big bite of awesome.

MENU.DESCRIPTION: Our premium sliced turkey breast, lean roast beef and tasty Black Forest ham…all  tossed with crunchy lettuce and your choice of tasty veggies. It's the Subway Club® salad, and it's amazing.

MENU.NAME: Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Enjoy our Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki flavors on a salad. Tender teriyaki-glazed chicken strips topped with fat-free sweet onion sauce over crisp greens and a generous pile of veggies. Flavor like whoa.

MENU.NAME: Tuna
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Our Tuna salad is simply delish. Flaked tuna mixed with mayo, riding high on top of a bed of crisp lettuce and veggies. Classic for a reason.

MENU.NAME: Turkey Breast
MENU.DESCRIPTION: The Turkey Breast salad is a go-to salad choice. Our premium sliced turkey breast, tossed together with lettuce, crunchy veggies and whatever dressing does it for you. Simply the best.

MENU.NAME: Veggie Delite®
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Enjoy the simpler things? The Veggie Delite® salad is simply delish. A pile of your favorite veggies, finished with the dressing of your choice. Crisp. Delicious. All for you.

MENU.NAME: Chipotle Steak and Cheese Salad
MENU.DESCRIPTION: As delicious as our sandwiches are, our salads are just as delicious and you can create them to fit whatever you’re craving. With such a variety to choose from, there is truly something for every taste.

MENU.NAME: Subway Melt® Salad
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Turkey, ham, bacon, and American cheese with lettuce, spinach, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, black olives and red onions.

MENU.NAME: Turkey & Bacon Guacamole Salad
MENU.DESCRIPTION: This salad is a flavor feast. Tender turkey breast, bacon, and guacamole with crisp lettuce, spinach, ripe tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers black olives and red onions. A salad that's truly sumptuous.

MENU.NAME: B.L.T. Salad
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Savory bacon. Crisp lettuce. Ripe tomatoes. All mixed with baby spinach, crunchy cucumbers, sweet green peppers, black olives, and zesty red onions.

MENU.NAME: Buffalo Chicken Salad
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Strips of delicious chicken coated in spicy buffalo sauce tossed with lettuce, spinach, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, black olives and red onions. A drizzle of ranch dressing cools the spice. Very nice.

MENU.NAME: Turkey Breast & Ham Salad
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Tender turkey breast and flavorful Black Forest Ham with lots of crisp lettuce, tender spinach, and many more of your favorite veggies.

MENU.NAME: Pizza Melt Salad
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Spicy pepperoni, American cheese and mouthwatering marinara sauce over crisp lettuce, spinach, ripe tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, black olives and red onions.

MENU.NAME: Veggie Patty Salad
MENU.DESCRIPTION: A delicious veggie patty mixed with lettuce, spinach, ripe tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, zesty red onions and black olives.

MENU.NAME: Turkey Italiano Salad
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Our turkey can now take you to real Italian flavor. Because it comes with spicy pepperoni, tempting salami and American cheese. It's all mixed with lettuce, spinach, tomatoes, zesty red onions, olives and lots more. Drizzled with our signature Subway® Vinaigrette sauce.

MENU.NAME: Black Forest Ham Mini for Kids
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Every kid likes to ham it up once in a while. That’s why they’ll love the taste of our Black Forest ham and their favorite veggies on freshly baked bread. Apple slices and a choice of an ice-cold bottle of low fat milk or Honest Kids’® Fruit Punch make this better-for-you meal a star.

MENU.NAME: Turkey Breast  Mini for Kids
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Kids love the taste of tender turkey breast, freshly baked bread and their favorite veggies. Apple slices and a choice of an ice-cold bottle of low fat milk or Honest Kids’® Fruit Punch make this better-for-you meal a star.

MENU.NAME: Veggie Delite® Mini for Kids
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Got a kid who loves vegetables above all else? Our Veggie Delite® kids meal piles all their favorites on freshly baked bread. Apple slices and a choice of an ice-cold bottle of low fat milk or Honest Kids’® Fruit Punch make this better-for-you meal a star.

MENU.NAME: Chocolate Chip Cookie
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Soft, buttery, chock full of chips. What more can we say? Enjoy.

MENU.NAME: Oatmeal Raisin Cookie
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Soft, chewy and delicious, our oatmeal raisin cookie is the perfect dessert, or snack.

MENU.NAME: White Chip Macadamia Nut Cookie
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Chunks of Macadamia nuts and white chips in a ridiculously delicious cookie.

MENU.NAME: Baked Lays Plain
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Baked Lays Plain

MENU.NAME: Doritos Nacho Cheese
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Doritos Nacho Cheese

MENU.NAME: Sunchips Harvest Cheddar
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Sunchips Harvest Cheddar

MENU.NAME: Apple sauce
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Apple sauce

MENU.NAME: Lays Classic Plain

MENU.NAME: 1% Low Fat Milk
MENU.DESCRIPTION: As delicious as our sandwiches are, they are even better when paired with the perfect side and drink or even adding a little something extra. With such a variety to choose from, there's truly something for every taste.

MENU.NAME: Honest Kids®
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Fresh Fit For Kids® meals are even more delicious with NEW Honest Kids® certified organic fruit punch. It’s 100% daily value of vitamin C, plus it’s sweetened with organic juice!

MENU.NAME: Dasani® Bottled Water
MENU.DESCRIPTION: As delicious as our sandwiches are, they are even better when paired with the perfect side and drink or even adding a little something extra. With such a variety to choose from, there's truly something for every taste.

MENU.NAME: Coke Classic
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Coke Classic

MENU.NAME: Cold Cut Combo 6 Inch Regular Sub
MENU.DESCRIPTION: The Cold Cut Combo sandwich with ham, salami, and bologna (all turkey based) is a long-time Subway® favorite. Yeah. It's that good.

MENU.NAME: Cold Cut Combo Footlong Regular Sub
MENU.DESCRIPTION: The Cold Cut Combo sandwich with ham, salami, and bologna (all turkey based) is a long-time Subway® favorite. Yeah. It's that good.

MENU.NAME: Meatball Marinara 6 Inch Regular Sub
MENU.DESCRIPTION: The Meatball Marinara sandwich is drenched in irresistible marinara sauce, sprinkled with Parmesan cheese,  topped with whatever you want (no judgement) and perfectly toasted just for you.

MENU.NAME: Meatball Marinara Footlong Regular Sub
MENU.DESCRIPTION: The Meatball Marinara sandwich is drenched in irresistible marinara sauce, sprinkled with Parmesan cheese,  topped with whatever you want (no judgement) and perfectly toasted just for you.

MENU.NAME: New Ham & Jack Slider
MENU.DESCRIPTION: The Ham & Jack delivers the flavors you crave in a smaller size. We start with a delicious telera slider roll then combine savory Black Forest Ham with pepper jack cheese for the ultimate flavor experience.

MENU.NAME: New Italian Spice Slider
MENU.DESCRIPTION: The Italian Spice delivers huge flavor in a smaller size. Crafted on a telera slider roll, we add pepperoni, salami and American cheese for the perfect flavor experience. It's not complete without our classic Subway® vinaigrette.

MENU.NAME: New Little Cheesesteak Slider
MENU.DESCRIPTION: The Little Cheesesteak packs BIG flavor. Handcrafted on a telera slider roll, we top it with tender shaved steak, American cheese, green peppers, red onions and zesty Chipotle Southwest sauce.

MENU.NAME: New Little Turkey Slider
MENU.DESCRIPTION: The Little Turkey is everything you love in a more cravable size. Made by hand on a telera slider roll, we combine our delicious turkey breast with savory pepper jack cheese. Then top it with spinach and mayo for good measure.
